first_para: Solomon Joseph Pascal Curtis (born 1 August 1996) is a British Labour Party (UK) politician and marketing consultant. He is currently Labour's Prospective Parliamentary Candidate (PPC) for Wealden (UK Parliament constituency), making him England's third youngest parliamentary candidate to Labour's candidate in South East Cornwall, Declan Lloyd, and Laura-Jane Rossington, the Communist Party of Britain candidate in Plymouth Sutton & Devonport.

full.extract:
Solomon Joseph Pascal Curtis (born 1 August 1996) is a British Labour Party (UK) politician and marketing consultant. He is currently Labour's Prospective Parliamentary Candidate (PPC) for Wealden (UK Parliament constituency), making him England's third youngest parliamentary candidate to Labour's candidate in South East Cornwall, Declan Lloyd, and Laura-Jane Rossington, the Communist Party of Britain candidate in Plymouth Sutton & Devonport.
^ http://blogs.channel4.com/michael-crick-on-politics/election-2015-ten-teenagers-running-parliament/4853
full.title: Solomon Curtis
